casebody.data:
John Robert ADAIR, Diljeet Singh Athwal, and John Spencer Emtage, Appellants, v. Paul J. CARTER and Leonard G. Presta, Appellees. No. 2011-1378. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Feb. 9, 2012. Doreen Yatko Trujillo, Cozen O’Connor, of Philadelphia, PA, argued for appellants. With her on the brief was Kyle Vos Strache. Oliver R. Ashe, Jr., Ashe, P.C., of Resten, VA, argued for appellees. Of counsel on the brief were Jeffrey P. Kushan and Rachel H. Townsend, Sidley Austin, LLP, of Washington, DC.

LINN, PROST, and O’MALLEY, Circuit Judges.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

THIS CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is

Ordered and Adjudged:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
